Package cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthorizationCallback
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/AuthorizationCallback.java

    Interface for handling AuthorizationRequest requests.
    OAuth2Grant
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2Grant.java

    Basic interface for implementing OAuth 2.0 grant.
    RedirectCallback
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/RedirectCallback.java

    Interface to return a WebPage as a response to a redirect to a local RedirectServer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorizationCodeGrant
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/AuthorizationCodeGrant.java

    Implementation of the OAuth 2.0 Authorization Code Grant.
    AuthorizationRequest
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/AuthorizationRequest.java

    Represents an authorization request of the OAuth 2.0 specification.
    ClientCredGrant
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/ClientCredGrant.java

    Implementation of the OAuth 2.0 Client Credentials Grant.
    ImplicitGrant
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/ImplicitGrant.java

    Implementation of the OAuth 2.0 Implicit Grant.
    OAuth2
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2.java

    Implementation of the OAuth 2.0 authorization framework.
    OAuth2Error
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2Error.java

    Class for holding information about an error that occurred.
    OAuth2Settings
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2Settings.java

    Generic settings for the OAuth 2.0 implementation.
    OAuth2Token
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2Token.java

    Generic OAuth 2.0 token class.
    RedirectServer
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/RedirectServer.java

    Simple HTTP server listening for OAuth 2.0 authorization code redirect.
    RedirectWebPage
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/RedirectWebPage.java

    Simple HTML web page serving as a response after authorization of the application on an external authorization site.
    RefreshTokenGrant
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/RefreshTokenGrant.java

    Implementation of the Refreshing an Access Token section of the OAuth 2.0 specification.
    ResOwnerPassCredGrant
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/ResOwnerPassCredGrant.java

    Implementation of the OAuth 2.0 Resource Owner Password Credentials Grant.
    WebPage
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/WebPage.java

    Abstract class defining basic structure of a web page returned by the RedirectServer after the redirect from an external authorization site.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OAuth2ErrorType
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2ErrorType.java

    List of all the error types that can occur in a response from the authorization server.
    OAuth2GrantType
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2GrantType.java

    Enumeration of all authorization grant types defined by RFC 6749.
    OAuth2TokenType
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2TokenType.java

    List of supported access token types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OAuth2SettingsException
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2SettingsException.java

    Exception thrown when inappropriate settings for an OAuth2Grant are supplied.
